title: National debt of selected countries in relation to gross domestic product ( GDP ) 2018
yAxis: National debt in relation to gross domestic product (GDP)
summary: The chart shows the National debt Country in terms of the National of debt with United_Kingdom having the National – 237.69 debt down to United_States the least debt of the group at 16.49 debt .
In between , we have Japan 237.69 , Russia 16.49 , Brazil 91.57 and France 99.31 .
gold: This statistic shows the national debt of important industrial and emerging countries in 2019 in relation to the gross domestic product ( GDP ) . In 2019 , the national debt of China was at about 55.57 percent of the gross domestic product .
